EmailTemplate.description: Sent to Online Applicants when Low Touch loan is approved
EmailTemplate.name: Online Application Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Application has been Approved!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!LLC_BI__Loan__c.OwnerFullName},
We're happy to inform you that your credit application has been approved! The loan terms to be extended are as follows:
Loan Amount: {!LLC_BI__Loan__c.LLC_BI__Amount__c} Interest Rate: 11% Loan Term: 60 Months
A representative from Your Financial Institution will be in touch soon with additional information.
Best Regards, Your Financial Institution
